overview: Mr PER Etholm has broad global banking, corporate and board experience from a 30 years International Banking and Private Equity career based in U.K., Norway and other Nordic countries, more recently in Switzerland as country and regional head for US headquartered Citigroup. He was a senior Credit Officer of Citigroup from 1991 and has served as Vice Chairman for Citigroup plc Europe. Before Citigroup Mr Etholm worked 3 years with UK based Hambros Bank. Mr Etholm serves on the Boards of the Swiss American Chamber of Commerce as member of the Chapter Board Doing Business in Switzerland and as member of the Finance Chapter Board. He is also a Board member of the Swiss Investor Managers Circle (SIMC) and Advisory Board Member of the Lorange Institute of Business Zurich.
